title: Mercury in Pisces
summary: Communication becomes intuitive and imaginative. Metaphor, music, and feeling may convey more than direct analysis. The opportunity is to let sensitivity guide insight without losing boundaries or facts.

meaning.headline: Mind drifts toward empathy, symbolism, and porous listening.

frames.text: Mercury in Pisces amplifies imagination and emotional attunement in communication.
Nonlinear thinking can connect disparate ideas creatively.
Art, music, or spiritual topics may feel especially resonant.
Silence and reflection can be as communicative as speech.
Boundaries should dissolve or facts no longer matter.

frictions: Absorbing others’ moods and losing focus

do: Translate imagery into clear steps before acting.
Set time limits for daydreaming and planning.
Clarify what is yours versus what you are picking up from others.
Use grounding tools—lists, timers, or collaborators.
Speak gently while still naming specifics.
avoid: Making promises based on inspiration alone
Ignoring data that contradicts a dream
Taking on emotional labor without support

reusable_lines.text: Let intuition inspire you, then translate it into something concrete.
Softness can communicate plenty—just pair it with clarity.

forbidden_claims: Promises of healing or spiritual outcomes
allowed_framing: Supportive framing: can heighten empathy and imagination
Agency-forward language: you choose how to ground inspiration
Contextual framing: sensitivity helps when paired with boundaries

sources: Mercury as mind/communication archetype in daily cycles
